taskDescription:
Create and monitor master launch workflow:
1. Track all component implementations
2. Coordinate integration points
3. Manage dependencies
4. Monitor timelines
5. Coordinate testing phases
6. Oversee launch sequence
workflowContext: Master coordination for SSELFIE Studio launch - ensuring all components come together smoothly.

workflowTemplate.name: Custom Workflow - diana
workflowTemplate.description: Master coordination for SSELFIE Studio launch - ensuring all components come together smoothly.

agents.taskDescription:
Create and monitor master launch workflow:
1. Track all component implementations
2. Coordinate integration points
3. Manage dependencies
4. Monitor timelines
5. Coordinate testing phases
6. Oversee launch sequence

coordinationSteps: 1. Initialize workflow and assign tasks to agents
2. Monitor agent progress and task completion
5. Validate success criteria and compile results
successCriteria: All assigned agents respond and acknowledge their tasks
All expected deliverables are provided by agents
No blocking errors or failures in task execution
